sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The Component Network diagnostics is centrally enabled for all ECUs in the vehicle by CRoute. This Component is used to detect Network Diagnstoic failures. Network Diagnostic Enable (NWDF) is a master controlled activation/deactivation of NWD. The NWDF-master is the central vehicle-Gateway. The Network Diagnostic Enable Bit (NWDF-Bit) (so_SI_NWDF) is used to enable/deactivate the NWD of NWDF-slaves. NWDF-slaves are ECUs, whose NWD is influenced by the NWDF bit.
